subject: Re: Login Verification?
preview: I'm not in on Friday's, so it'll probably be Monday/Tuesday, but i'll let the rest of the team know to advise you if they encounter the same.  Kind regards,  Elise   ​http://www.totalcontacts.com.au

full_threads.body:
I'm not in on Friday's, so it'll probably be Monday/Tuesday, but i'll let the rest of the team know to advise you if they encounter the same.

Kind regards,

Elise


​http://www.totalcontacts.com.au/

https://www.facebook.com/totalcontacts

HI Elise,

We have updated settings to bypass 2FA and recaptcha with your IP address. Can we check again tomorrow morning?

Morning!

Today is 3rd morning in a row





Kind regards,

Elise


​http://www.totalcontacts.com.au/

https://www.facebook.com/totalcontacts

I get bot-blocked a lot 😂

Thanks for looking into this, it's appreciated.

Kind regards,

Elise


​http://www.totalcontacts.com.au/

https://www.facebook.com/totalcontacts

Hi Elise,

We have updated the reCAPTCHA human/bot threshold score. "A reCAPTCHA score equal to or higher than this value will be considered human. Anything lower will be treated as a bot and require additional verification for login and registration."

This will lessen the verification threshold.

Morning,

I'm logging in this morning and have the verification again:




Kind regards,

Elise


​http://www.totalcontacts.com.au/

https://www.facebook.com/totalcontacts

Hi there,

I logged out and back in and didn't get the verification request.

In saying that, I'll ususally get it when I first log in at the start of the day and it's not every day it comes up.

If it comes up again this week I'll let you know 🙂

Kind regards,

Elise


​http://www.totalcontacts.com.au/

https://www.facebook.com/totalcontacts

Hi Elise,

We have made updates to the site. Can you please try again?

Morning,

I'm still getting this come up every couple of log-ins:



It sends a link to my personal @totaleyecare address that I need to click on to be able to access the page:



No-one else that is on the same level as me (shop manager) is getting this notification, so if I'm getting the hassle of 2fa I'd like to be upgraded to an Admin please (if Lee has no objections?).

Kind regards,

Elise


​http://www.totalcontacts.com.au/

https://www.facebook.com/totalcontacts

Hi Elise,

It looks like wordpress firewall protection is kicking in. We have whitelisted the IP address "103.44.24.6".

Regarding your user role, At the moment it is set as "Shop Manager". Do you want us to update this to Administrator? "edavis@totaleyecare.com.au"

Hi,

It is not Lee asking about this.

Please re-read the original email.

Kind regards,

Elise


​http://www.totalcontacts.com.au/

https://www.facebook.com/totalcontacts

Hi Lee,

We have reset your 2FA, can you please try now?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia ran the **Needs Joel's assistance** workflow
Workflows ran the **Needs Joel's assistance** workflow

full_threads.body: Hi @joel need your help with this ticket. Thanks!

Morning!

I've been getting the following notice when trying to log in to the dashboard:

This is the 3rd one since 31/10/24, I'm just wondering if something has changed?
I've not been upgraded to Administration.


Kind regards,


Elise
